bbc581 joined #xwiki at 19:10  
maggo joined #xwiki at 19:14  
maggo - (15/06/2009 19:15): hi @ all, i update to the latest XEM version and had now one little problem , my eventCalendar wouldn't work it shows me just the code? Do someone know about this ?  
sdumitriu - (15/06/2009 19:15): I think that the plugin jar is missing  
sdumitriu - (15/06/2009 19:16): Can you check?  
maggo - (15/06/2009 19:18): can you tell me the filename?  
sdumitriu - (15/06/2009 19:18): xwiki-plugin-calendar-1.0.jar     
sdumitriu - (15/06/2009 19:19): http://maven.xwiki.org/releases/com/xpn/xwiki/platform/plugins/xwiki-plugin-calendar/1.0/xwiki-plugin-calendar-1.0.jar  
trifon left at 19:20 ("ChatZilla 0.9.84 [Firefox 3.0.11/2009060215]")  
anamarias left at 19:23 ()  
maggo - (15/06/2009 19:23): hm confiusing, in my old installtion directory /opt/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise-manager-mysql-1.4/webapps/xwiki/WEB-INF/lib there was no such a file...   
maggo - (15/06/2009 19:24): is and in my xwiki.cfg is no plugin line like the others, is there a documentation availible how to add such a line in xiwki.cfg like the others?  
sdumitriu - (15/06/2009 19:25): The plugin is missing from the older version because it was included inside the core jar. It has been recently moved out into a separate project  
maggo - (15/06/2009 19:26): ah ok, and i found the line i searched in the old config file i thinki, com.xpn.xwiki.plugin.calendar.CalendarPlugin .. right?  
sdumitriu - (15/06/2009 19:27): Yes  
jvdrean left at 19:27 ()  
venkatesh joined #xwiki at 19:27  
kaaloo left at 19:28 (Read error: 113 (No route to host))  
maggo - (15/06/2009 19:28): hm won't work :-(  
sdumitriu - (15/06/2009 19:30): Did you restart the container?  
sdumitriu - (15/06/2009 19:30): Make sure the commas are correctly placed  
maggo - (15/06/2009 19:30): yes i restartet the tomcat, ist that enough?  
sdumitriu - (15/06/2009 19:30): And the \ at the end of the previous line  
maggo - (15/06/2009 19:31): yes commas and \ are right  
maggo - (15/06/2009 19:31): do i need new xar files?  
glerouge left at 19:31 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
sdumitriu - (15/06/2009 19:32): I don't know, probably not  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 19:33  
maggo - (15/06/2009 19:36): ok sorry the failure was between screen and chair ;-)  
maggo - (15/06/2009 19:36): i uploaded the jar file into the false direcotry  
maggo - (15/06/2009 19:37): now it works, thx for help!  
maggo - (15/06/2009 19:38): last question, why isn't the plugin jar not in the downloaded XEM zip file? any special reason?  
sdumitriu - (15/06/2009 19:56): The calendar application was deprecated, since it doesn't meet the quality requirements

cristinas - (15/06/2009 22:27): i have a question .. how can i get the syntax of a page (using the xmlrpc client) .. i know maybe it sounds silly but i didn't find it ..  
sdumitriu - (15/06/2009 22:29): You can't right now  
cristinas - (15/06/2009 22:30): and how can I solve this problem?  
sdumitriu - (15/06/2009 22:30): Implement it  
cristinas - (15/06/2009 22:30): ok  
cristinas - (15/06/2009 22:30): thanks  
cristinas - (15/06/2009 22:31): so I add a function at the xmlrpc client module  
cristinas - (15/06/2009 22:31): and server of course  
sdumitriu - (15/06/2009 22:31): Yes
